descriptionHtml:
The dagger Keening was missing an entry for its enchantment amount in Skyrim, giving it a max charge of zero, which prevented its abilities from working. Versions 1.0 or 1.1 give Keening a max charge of 5000, and version 1.2 changes Keening to an unlimited use item.

Keening is also missing a smithing grindstone upgrade entry. Impulseve\'s mod, [url=http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=1020]Lost Art of the Blacksmith[/url], fixes this issue, as well as many other smithing bugs. Standalone smithing is included in Keening Fix version 1.0, but from 1.1 onward, [url=http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=1020]Lost Art of the Blacksmith[/url] is a required download if you want to upgrade Keening. If you download the FOMod installer version, there is a checkbox for standalone smithing. I recommend leaving it unchecked and instead installing Lost Art of the Blacksmith, but it is there for those that do not wish to install that mod but still want to upgrade Keening.

________

INSTRUCTIONS

Simply download with the Nexus Mod Manager, or Download the .zip archive manually and extract the included .esp to Skyrim\'s data folder, usually located at \"Program Files\\Steam\\steamapps\\common\\skyrim\\data\". Upon opening the game, choose \"Data Files\" and make sure KeeningFix.esp is enabled.
________

VERSION HISTORY

1.3.1 - Text fix for 100 charge Keening.

1.3 - FOMod installer with custom options.

1.2 - Keening now has unlimited charge.

1.1 - Removes smithing options and instead relies on Lost Art of the Blacksmith.

1.0 - Initial release - Adds smithing options and fixes enchantment charge.

________

FAQ

Q: What UI mods are you using in the images?
A: I\'m using [url=http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=667]QD Inventory[/url], with the [url=http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=95]Morpheus font[/url].

________

OTHER BUG FIXES

The following are more bug fixes that help to clean up vanilla Skyrim. Contact me about exchanging links.

[url=http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=3077]Helmet Slot Stacking Fix[/url]
[url=http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=3329]Morokei Mask Enchantment Fix[/url]
[url=http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=3473]Talos Shrine Fix[/url]
[url=http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=1946]Ebony Blade Fixed[/url]
[url=http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=5669]Ebony Dagger Speed Fix[/url]
[url=http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=4613]A Nightingale Blade Fix[/url]
author: ZeroTorrent
